widget.name: list
widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (65, 8), size = (1020, 35), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (55, 45), size = (1020, 35), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 20), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 70 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,5),size = (760,30),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50,35),size = (720,70),font = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP,text = 2,color=0xffffff,color_sel=0xffffff),# index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Roboto_HD",24),gFont("Roboto_HD",20)], "itemHeight": 110 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (5, 6), size = (56, 28), flags = BT_SCALE, png = 0), # Flag. MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 3), size = (350, 34), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # Language name (Native). MultiContentEntryText(pos = (430, 3), size = (330, 34), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # Lanuage name (English). # MultiContentEntryText(pos = (760, 3), size = (75, 34), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # Locale name. MultiContentEntryText(pos = (835, 3), size = (75, 34), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # Package name. MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (980, 13), size = (40, 14), flags = BT_SCALE, png = 5) # Status icon. ], "fonts": [gFont("Roboto_HD",24)], "itemHeight": 40 }
